<!DOCTYPE html>
		<html lang="en-gb">
		<?php 
		$$this->open("head");
		require_once("{$$this->partial['header']}");
		$$this->close("head");
		$$this->open("body");
		?>
		<?php
		if(!empty($$this->flash->message)):
		$$this->open("div", "flash", array("container", "flash"))
		->p()->id("flash-message")->addClass(array("flash-bg",
		"green"))->closeElement()
		->text($$this->flash->message)
		->close("p")
		->close("div");
		endif;
		?>
		<?php
		$$this->open("div", "content", "container");
		?>
		<!-- HTML from here, if you like -->${cursor}
		<?php
		$$this->close("div");
		require_once("{$$this->partial['footer']}");
		$$this->close("body");
		?>
		</html>
